title: Chirin no Suzu (Ringing Bell)
synopsis: Chirin, a newborn lamb, and his mother live a peaceful life in a meadow. As long as they stay inside the fence that protects them and the rest of the flock, they are free to frolic and graze on the delicious clover leaves. However, their idyllic life is shattered when a wolf named Wor attacks them in the dead of night, killing Chirin's mother.
staff: [['Hata, Masami', ['Director']], ['Yanase, Takashi', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Original Creator']], ['Izumi, Taku', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Music']], ['Furukawa, Masashi', ['Editing']]]
